name: Snowball Simulator 2022
description:
Made in 72 hours for Buddy Up Jam Winter 2022

Aim to get as many points as possible by rolling your snowball! 

Collect power-ups and watch your snowball get even FASTER and CHONKIER!

Lightning Power-Ups increase your speed.

Arrow Power-Ups increase your growth rate.

Controls:

WASD Movement Scheme

E - Zoom Out

R - Zoom In

'Esc' - End Game

Credits

Programming/Mechanics - Russell Umboh

QA Testing - Russell Umboh / Arnav Rastogi

Assets 

  • Power-Up Icons by Kevin Kapoor
  • Free Rocks by Triplebrick from the Unity Asset Store (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/free-rocks-1928...)
  • Snow Ground Texture by Ilona Lablaika @ Dreamstime.com (https://www.dreamstime.com/snow-ground-freshly-fallen-thin-layer-as-background-t...)
  • Snow Texture by Simon Berger @ Unsplash.com (https://unsplash.com/photos/WuVnejweXBw)

This was my first game done in Unity! Huge shout-out to my roommates for helping me with some of the assets and bug testing for the game!
